titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Zachariah W. Owen
CWG13706

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
No 22.
The State of Kentucky
To Zachariah W owens Dr

row.cell: For Transportation of thirty four recruits of Capt. J. R. Jacobs company 14th Ky Cavalry from Red river Iron works Powell co Ky to Mt Sterling, fourteen miles at 2 cts per mile
nine dollars and fifty two cents

p.note:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno W Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; and that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service

Jos. W. Stivers. Lt
& recruiting officer
Received at Frankfort, the 22 of Sept 1863 S G. Suddarth Quartermaster ^Genl^ Kentucky volunteers the sum of nine Dollars and fifty two cents in full of the above account

No 22
no 3 abst U
Zachariah. W. owen
Dollars 9 -- 52/100
Paid Sept 22 63
